import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
source.60ddecfd:
train['Sex_binario'] = train['Sex'].map(transf_sex)
test['Sex_binario'] = test['Sex'].map(transf_sex)

features =  ['Sex_binario', 'Age', 'Pclass', 'SibSp', 'Parch', 'Fare', 'Embarked']

for feature in features:
    typeCol = train[feature].dtypes
    if typeCol=='int64' or typeCol=='float64':
        train[feature] = train[feature].fillna(train[feature].mean())
    elif typeCol=='object':
        train[feature] = train[feature].fillna(train[feature].mode())
    
for feature in features:
    typeCol = test[feature].dtypes
    if typeCol=='int64' or typeCol=='float64':
        test[feature] = test[feature].fillna(test[feature].mean())
    elif typeCol=='object':
        test[feature] = test[feature].fillna(test[feature].mode())

train['Embarked'] = train['Embarked'].fillna('S')

le = LabelEncoder()
le.fit(train['Embarked'])
train['Embarked'] = le.transform(train['Embarked'])

le = LabelEncoder()
le.fit(test['Embarked'])
test['Embarked'] = le.transform(test['Embarked'])

X = train[features]
y = train['Survived']
